title: Provisionals
body: I finished b2 last season (ik its bad) and i was wondering how many of my provis I'm gonna need to win to get a decent rank like silver 5

replies.body: They put most people in lower ranks. Promo helper is up anyway so it's easier to climb if you're good enough to reach promos easy, and you won't get screwed over by the trolls.
atleast 8 out of 10 to be honest
i dont think you will get silver tbh. You will lose ranks
people are winning all 10 and still getting bronze you will probs just get the same rank
